text.content:
Skull Crush

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} until healed.

Bludgeoning

hand Wound

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and can't use one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Piercing

Broad Swipe

The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success].

Slashing

Lingering Damage

The target takes [[/r 1d6[persistent]]] damage of the same type as the bomb or spell's damage.

Bomb or Spell
